committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to provide for the office of Poet Laureate of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to establish the Office of Poet Laureate of the United States. Sets forth the duties and terms of such office.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to provide for the office of Poet Laureate of the United States.
